items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: A warm red liquid that mends wounds. It tastes faintly of berries.

items.name: Bell Clapper
items.description: The missing piece of the time bell. Cold to the touch. You can feel something sealed within it.

items.name: Ether
items.description: A shimmering blue liquid that restores magical energy. It hums softly.
